plot outline: The film is about Venkob Rao (Anant Nag), a middle class simpleton ailing with Alzheimer's, who goes missing. His son, Shiva (Rakshit Shetty) is a career driven person, who is forced to pause his hectic life to search for his father. Sahana (Shruti Hariharan), a doctor who takes care of Venkob Rao also gets involved. In his search for his father, he finds a lot more than he set out to find.
title: Godhi Banna Sadharana Mykattu
akas: Godhi Banna Sadharna Mykattu (India, English title)
Wheatish Complexion, Average Build (World-wide, English title)
plot: The film is about Venkob Rao (Anant Nag), a middle class simpleton ailing with Alzheimer's, who goes missing. His son, Shiva (Rakshit Shetty) is a career driven person, who is forced to pause his hectic life to search for his father. Sahana (Shruti Hariharan), a doctor who takes care of Venkob Rao also gets involved. In his search for his father, he finds a lot more than he set out to find.::Harish Mallya

When a middle-aged man who suffers from Alzheimer's disease goes missing, his son embarks on a desperate search to find him with help from a female doctor. Will the son succeed in his mission? What challenges will the father be forced to face?::Shrinivas G. Kulkarni
